management structure While Eric Schmidt will step down as CEO he will assume the role of executive chairman focusing on deals, partnerships and broader business relationships as well as advising founders Larry Page and Sergey Brin . We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time, Eric Schmidt said.`` By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. Eric Schmidt was drafted in as chief executive in 2001 to provide`` adult supervision'' for the fledgling search engine. The 55-year-old will become executive chairman of the internet powerhouse, and will focus on deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships .
